name: part_012
file: tmp_【  #アキロゼ生誕祭2023 】ーStart your journeyー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ】 [n-pNnnM2ERs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Credit roll showcasing clips of the live performance and staff names while an instrumental version of 'Music Wizard of OZ' plays.
Final scene with Aki Rosenthal resting and a handwritten message to her fans appearing on screen.
End card with the 'Start your journey' logo and event hashtag.

subtitles.original: ロゼ隊という宝物に会えたのが
subtitles.english: Meeting the treasure known as the Rosetai

subtitles.original: これからも一緒に旅をしてくれる？
subtitles.english: Will you continue to journey with me?
